question: How much improvement do the introduced model achieve compared to the previous models?
ground_truth:
GRURNTN, character: 0.06 absolute / 4.32% relative bits-per-character.
LSTMRNTN, character: 0.03 absolute / 2.22% relative bits-per-character.
GRURNTN, word: 10.4 absolute / 10.63% relative perplexity.
LSTMRNTN, word: 11.29 absolute / 10.42% relative perplexity.
